text: Robert Marshall Utley (October 31, 1929 â€“ June 7, 2022) was an American writer and historian. He wrote sixteen books on the history of the American West. He was a chief historian for the National Park Service. Utley died on June 7, 2022 in Scottsdale, Arizona at the age of 92.In Memoriam: Robert M.
